methods.Synopsis: Logs a user in and sets the oauth token

parameters.Name: email
parameters.Description: The email address of the user

parameters.Name: password
parameters.Description: The password for the email address

parameters.Name: client
parameters.Description: The descriptor for the client device.  Current known values are penzu_ios and penzu_android.  Assigned value of penzu_ios if none provided.

methods.Synopsis: Creates or updates a user to pro, and then logs them in

parameters.Name: email
parameters.Description: The email address of the user

parameters.Name: password
parameters.Description: The password for the email address

parameters.Name: retype_password
parameters.Description: Required only if upgrade is not present or false

parameters.Name: itunes_receipt_data
parameters.Description: Receipt data returned from iTunes

parameters.Name: itunes_transaction_id
parameters.Description: Transaction ID for the order from iTunes

parameters.Name: upgrade
parameters.Description: If present, indicates that we are upgrading an existing user

parameters.Name: first_name
parameters.Description: First name of the user.

parameters.Name: last_name
parameters.Description: Last name of the user.

parameters.Name: full_name
parameters.Description: Full name of the registering user, first name followed by last name

parameters.Name: client
parameters.Description: The descriptor for the client device.  Current known values are penzu_ios and penzu_android

methods.Synopsis: Renews a users' pro account based on iTunes receipt, and then logs them in

parameters.Name: email
parameters.Description: The email address of the user

parameters.Name: password
parameters.Description: The password for the email address

parameters.Name: itunes_receipt_data
parameters.Description: Receipt data returned from iTunes

parameters.Name: itunes_transaction_id
parameters.Description: Transaction ID for the order from iTunes

methods.Synopsis: Pulls down all information needed for a client app session in one go. Includes all active journals, 15 most recent entries in each, and visible photos for each entry.
Verifies that the user for the given credentials exists and is not a Pro user

parameters.Name: email
parameters.Description: The email address of the user

parameters.Name: password
parameters.Description: The password for the email address

methods.Synopsis: Verifies all provided user account information to see if it would pass create-validation, without actually saving the object. Only email is required, all other values are verified only if they were provided.

parameters.Name: email
parameters.Description: The email address of the user

parameters.Name: password
parameters.Description: The password for the email address

parameters.Name: retype_password
parameters.Description: Required only if upgrade is not present or false

parameters.Name: full_name
parameters.Description: Full name of the registering user, first name followed by last name.  Can either use this, or first and last name fields below.

parameters.Name: first_name
parameters.Description: First name of the user.

parameters.Name: last_name
parameters.Description: Last name of the user.

methods.Synopsis: Retrieves account and billing information for the authorized user
Updates account information for the user

parameters.Name: id
parameters.Description: The ID of the user

parameters.Name: disable_auto_renew
parameters.Description: A truthful value indicates that auto renew should be disabled for the user

methods.Synopsis: Gets a list of the journals for the authenticated user
Gets the specified journal

parameters.Name: id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Journal (can be appended to the path of the URL)

methods.Synopsis: Creates a new journal for the authenticated user from the provided parameters

parameters.Name: name
parameters.Description: The name of the journal

parameters.Name: created
parameters.Description: The time this journal was created, in seconds from epoch. Sets the created_at value

parameters.Name: created_at
parameters.Description: The time this journal was created, in seconds from epoch. Sets the created_at value

parameters.Name: modified
parameters.Description: The time this journal was modified, in seconds from epoch. Sets the modified_at value

parameters.Name: modified_at
parameters.Description: The time this journal was modified, in seconds from epoch. Sets the modified_at value

parameters.Name: updated
parameters.Description: The time this journal was last updated, in seconds from epoch. Sets the last_update value

parameters.Name: last_update
parameters.Description: The time this journal was last updated, in seconds from epoch. Sets the last_update value

parameters.Name: locked
parameters.Description: Indicates if the journal is locked.  A value of 1 is true, 0 is false.

parameters.Name: lock_type_id
parameters.Description: The type of lock the journal has applied.

parameters.Name: password
parameters.Description: The Bcrypt hashed value of the password used ot lock the journals

parameters.Name: password_hash
parameters.Description: The Bcrypt hashed value of the password used ot lock the journals

parameters.Name: password_hint
parameters.Description: Hint for password

parameters.Name: status
parameters.Description: The status of the Journal.  Set to Active if not provided or not a valid status.

methods.Synopsis: Updates the specified Journal

parameters.Name: id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Journal (can be appended to the path of the URL)

parameters.Name: lock
parameters.Description: Indicates the journal is locked.

parameters.Name: lock_type_id
parameters.Description: The type of lock the journal has applied.

parameters.Name: unlock
parameters.Description: Indicates the journal is to be unlocked.

parameters.Name: plain_password
parameters.Description: The password for the journal.  Required if lock or unlock is set

parameters.Name: retype_password
parameters.Description: The password for the journal.  Required if lock is set

parameters.Name: password_hint
parameters.Description: Hint for password

parameters.Name: name
parameters.Description: The name of the journal

parameters.Name: created
parameters.Description: The time this journal was created, in seconds from epoch. Sets the created_at value

parameters.Name: created_at
parameters.Description: The time this journal was created, in seconds from epoch. Sets the created_at value

parameters.Name: modified
parameters.Description: The time this journal was modified, in seconds from epoch. Sets the modified_at value

parameters.Name: modified_at
parameters.Description: The time this journal was modified, in seconds from epoch. Sets the modified_at value

parameters.Name: updated
parameters.Description: The time this journal was last updated, in seconds from epoch. Sets the last_update value

parameters.Name: last_update
parameters.Description: The time this journal was last updated, in seconds from epoch. Sets the last_update value

parameters.Name: status
parameters.Description: The status of the Journal.  Set to Active if not provided or not a valid status.

methods.Synopsis: Deletes the specified Journal and all entries within it

parameters.Name: id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Journal (can be appended to the path of the URL)

methods.Synopsis: Gets a list of the entries in the specified journal for the authenticated user

parameters.Name: journal_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Journal

methods.Synopsis: Gets the specified Entry

parameters.Name: journal_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Journal

parameters.Name: entry_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Entry

methods.Synopsis: Creates a new Entry in the specified journal

parameters.Name: journal_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Journal

parameters.Name: title
parameters.Description: The title of the entry

parameters.Name: body
parameters.Description: The body of the entry

parameters.Name: locked
parameters.Description: Indicates if the entry is locked.  A value of 1 is true, 0 is false.

parameters.Name: password
parameters.Description: The Bcrypt hashed value of the password used to lock the entry

parameters.Name: password_hash
parameters.Description: The Bcrypt hashed value of the password used to lock the entry

parameters.Name: password_hint
parameters.Description: Hint for password

parameters.Name: created
parameters.Description: The time this entry was created, in seconds from epoch. Sets the created_at value

parameters.Name: created_at
parameters.Description: The time this entry was created, in seconds from epoch. Sets the created_at value

parameters.Name: modified
parameters.Description: The time this entry was modified, in seconds from epoch. Sets the modified_at value

parameters.Name: modified_at
parameters.Description: The time this entry was modified, in seconds from epoch. Sets the modified_at value

parameters.Name: opened
parameters.Description: The time this entry was last opened, in seconds from epoch. Sets the opened_at value

parameters.Name: opened_at
parameters.Description: The time this entry was last opened, in seconds from epoch. Sets the opened_at value

parameters.Name: status
parameters.Description: The status of the Entry.  Set to Active if not provided or not a valid status.

methods.Synopsis: Updates the specified Entry

parameters.Name: journal_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Journal

parameters.Name: entry_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Entry

parameters.Name: title
parameters.Description: The title of the entry

parameters.Name: body
parameters.Description: The body of the entry

parameters.Name: append_index
parameters.Description: The index in the body where new plaintext has been appended to existing rich text.

parameters.Name: locked
parameters.Description: Indicates if the entry is locked.  A value of 1 is true, 0 is false.

parameters.Name: password
parameters.Description: The Bcrypt hashed value of the password used to lock the entry

parameters.Name: password_hash
parameters.Description: The Bcrypt hashed value of the password used to lock the entry

parameters.Name: password_hint
parameters.Description: Hint for password

parameters.Name: created
parameters.Description: The time this entry was created, in seconds from epoch. Sets the created_at value

parameters.Name: created_at
parameters.Description: The time this entry was created, in seconds from epoch. Sets the created_at value

parameters.Name: modified
parameters.Description: The time this entry was modified, in seconds from epoch. Sets the modified_at value

parameters.Name: modified_at
parameters.Description: The time this entry was modified, in seconds from epoch. Sets the modified_at value

parameters.Name: opened
parameters.Description: The time this entry was last opened, in seconds from epoch. Sets the opened_at value

parameters.Name: opened_at
parameters.Description: The time this entry was last opened, in seconds from epoch. Sets the opened_at value

parameters.Name: status
parameters.Description: The status of the Entry.  Set to Active if not provided or not a valid status.

parameters.Name: lock
parameters.Description: Indicates the entry is locked.

parameters.Name: lock_type_id
parameters.Description: The type of lock the entry has applied.

parameters.Name: unlock
parameters.Description: Indicates the journal is to be unlocked.

parameters.Name: plain_password
parameters.Description: The password for the journal.  Required if lock or unlock is set

parameters.Name: retype_password
parameters.Description: The password for the journal.  Required if lock is set

parameters.Name: password_hint
parameters.Description: Hint for password

parameters.Name: make_editable
parameters.Description: If present, indicates that the entire entry should be made editable

parameters.Name: remove_photo
parameters.Description: ID of the photo that should be removed from the entry

methods.Synopsis: Deletes the specified Entry

parameters.Name: journal_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Journal

parameters.Name: entry_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Entry

methods.Synopsis: Gets a list of the photos for the specified entry

parameters.Name: journal_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Journal

parameters.Name: entry_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Entry

methods.Synopsis: Gets the specified Photo

parameters.Name: journal_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Journal

parameters.Name: entry_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Entry

parameters.Name: photo_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Photo

methods.Synopsis: Creates and attaches a new Photo in the specified Entry

parameters.Name: journal_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Journal

parameters.Name: entry_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Entry

parameters.Name: image
parameters.Description: The image to be attached to the entry.

parameters.Name: photo_position
parameters.Description: The integer value for the position of the photo.  Should be > 0

parameters.Name: position
parameters.Description: The integer value for the position of the photo.  Should be > 0

parameters.Name: photo_updated
parameters.Description: The time this photo was last updated, in seconds from epoch. Sets the image_updated_at value

parameters.Name: updated_at
parameters.Description: The time this photo was last updated, in seconds from epoch. Sets the image_updated_at value

methods.Synopsis: Updates the specified Photo

parameters.Name: journal_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Journal

parameters.Name: entry_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Entry

parameters.Name: photo_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Photo

parameters.Name: modified
parameters.Description: The time this photo was last modified, in seconds from epoch. If a modified time is provided, and its older than the one in the DB, the photo is not updated.

parameters.Name: position
parameters.Description: The integer value for the position of the photo.  Should be > 0

parameters.Name: photo_updated
parameters.Description: The time this photo was last updated, in seconds from epoch. Sets the image_updated_at value

parameters.Name: updated_at
parameters.Description: The time this photo was last updated, in seconds from epoch. Sets the image_updated_at value

methods.Synopsis: Deletes the specified Photo

parameters.Name: journal_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Journal

parameters.Name: entry_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Entry

parameters.Name: photo_id
parameters.Description: The ID of the Photo
